title: Guest House for Sale in Bandarawela
details:
Villa in Bandarawela

2km from the city on Welimada road.

5 Bed Rooms with attached bathroom

Large hall and ample dining space,

There is enough space for further development as the property consist of 48 perches.

The facility is equipped with , Hot water system, and all other amenities for a guest house
